#text=Earth day is a very important day in America .
#text=It is a day where we recognize the environment and the fact that we need to protect it .
#text=This earth day my friend Patrick and I decided that we should plant a tree to counteract the effects of deforesting .
#text=To do this we first dug a hole in the ground twice the size of the root ball of the tree .
#text=It was hard work , but it ensures that the tree has enough loose soil to spread its roots in .
#text=We then placed the tree in the middle of the pit we had dug and made sure it was centered .
#text=After that we filled in the rest of the pit with a high quality planting soil in order to give the tree proper nutrition .
#text=After the soil was placed in we stepped on the soil to compact it and make sure the tree stays in place .
#text=It felt really good to give back to the environment instead of damaging it .
